mapper.insert: insert into project(pid, pname, sday, eday, methodologyid, mid, pstatuscode, stmtime, detail) values(seq_pid.nextval, #{pname}, #{sday}, #{eday}, #{methodologyid}, #{mid}, 1, sysdate, #{detail})
mapper.select: select * from project where pid in (select pid from pmember where mid=#{mid})
